features.label: Core Features
features.title: Why Choose Nano Banana?
features.description: Nano Banana is the most advanced AI image editor on LMArena. Revolutionize your photo editing with natural language understanding and unmatched precision.

natural.title: Natural Language Editing
natural.description: Edit images using simple conversational prompts. Nano Banana AI understands complex instructions, just like GPT understands text.

character.title: Character Consistency
character.description: Maintain perfect character identity across multiple edits. Easily preserve facial features, styles, and unique characteristics.

scene.title: Scene Preservation
scene.description: Keep original backgrounds and scene elements intact while making targeted edits. Perfect for professional workflows.

oneshot.title: One-Shot Editing
oneshot.description: Get perfect results on the first try. No need for multiple iterations or complex parameter adjustments.

multi.title: Multi-Image Context
multi.description: Process multiple reference images simultaneously. Advanced workflows for complex editing tasks.

ugc.title: AI UGC Creation
ugc.description: Create consistent AI influencers and user-generated content. Perfect for social media campaigns.

background.title: Background Removal
background.description: Instantly remove backgrounds from any image with perfect edge detection. Professional results in seconds.

quick.title: One-Click Edit
quick.description: Get instant AI-powered edits with one click. Fast, efficient, and surprisingly accurate.

video.title: Video Generation
video.description: Transform text and images into stunning AI videos. Powered by Google Veo 3.1, generate professional-quality videos in minutes.

faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.description: Everything you need to know about Nano Banana
faq.q1: How is Nano Banana different from other AI image editors?
faq.a1: Nano Banana uses advanced natural language processing to understand complex editing instructions. Our models excel at character consistency and scene preservation, outperforming competitors like Flux Kontext in benchmarks.
faq.a2: Simply drag and drop your images or click the upload button. Nano Banana supports all common image formats (JPG, PNG, WebP) up to 10MB. You can upload multiple reference images for batch processing.
faq.q3: Can I use Nano Banana for commercial projects?
faq.a3: Yes! All images generated with Nano Banana can be used for commercial purposes. Our Pro and Enterprise plans include full commercial licensing with no attribution required.
faq.q4: What is character consistency and why is it important?
faq.a4: Character consistency means maintaining the same facial features, style, and identity across multiple edits. It's crucial for creating AI influencers, brand mascots, or any series of images featuring the same character.
faq.q5: How fast is the image generation process?
faq.a5: Nano Banana generates high-quality images in an average of 2 seconds. Our optimized neural engine ensures lightning-fast processing without compromising quality.
faq.q6: Do you offer an API for developers?
faq.a6: Yes! We provide a comprehensive REST API with detailed documentation. Enterprise customers get priority support and higher rate limits for production applications.
faq.q7: What kind of prompts work best?
faq.a7: Natural, descriptive prompts work best. Describe what you want to change in simple English, including details about lighting, style, and specific elements. Our AI understands context and nuance.
faq.a8: Yes! New users get 50 free credits to try all features. No credit card required. You can upgrade to a paid plan anytime to continue using Nano Banana.
